resources.string: troll blacksmith
This troll blacksmith looks like all trolls look: he is tall and lean, and his skin resembles stone in both color and texture. The troll blacksmith is tinkering with unproportionally small tools.

Hey human! Wanna be useful, eh? Take dis pickaxe and mine me some _dark gold ore_, _15 pieces_ should be enough. What do you mean, how am I gonna pay? You greedy...\nOk, ok, I don\'t have money to pay, but I can do some smithin\' for you. Consider yourself lucky, I\'m the only blacksmith around.

Hey human! Wanna be useful, eh? Take dis pickaxe and _kill a bat_ wit\' it, I need its blood on the head. What do you mean, how am I gonna pay? You greedy...\nOk, ok, I don\'t have money to pay, but I can do some smithin\' for you. Consider yourself lucky, I\'m the only blacksmith around.
Are you kiddin\' me? Where is my pickaxe?!
Dark gold ore. 15 pieces. Seriously, is it dat hard?
I said I need bat blood on the pickaxe. Chop chop!
Oh, you have returned... Better late dan never.
I\'m busy. Get lost!
your %s certainly looks better now

Please... Help me... Find the rose...

Oh, what a pleasant surprise to meet a decent person in such place! I came here for a rare ingredient - a _Rotberry seed_. Being a magic user, I\'m quite able to defend myself against local monsters, but I\'m getting lost in no time, it\'s very embarrassing. Probably you could help me? I would be happy to pay for your service with one of my best wands.
Any luck with a Rotberry seed, %s? No? Don\'t worry, I\'m not in a hurry.

This middle age man seems to be mildly annoyed and excited at the same time. He wears a composite armor made of bone fragments.

Ah! It is such a rare sight! A fellow adventurer which is not dead. Outstanding! Oh... I beg my pardon, sometimes I get too excited. You see, I am myself a necromancer. And even though studying the dead and death itself is what I do for a living, seeing same thing over and over again, eventually gets extremely boring. On the other hoof that\'s exactly why I am here. According to my calculations in just a couple of weeks, somewhere in this very dungeon, something spectacular going to happen. A _Necropolis_, an ancient city of the dead going to open it\'s doors. And... I can\'t really say to much, I wasted enough time as it is. I need to get ready, _come back later_.

Ah! An adventurer which is not dead. Outstanding! Oh... I beg my pardon. You see, I am myself a necromancer. And even though studying the dead and death itself is what I do for a living, seeing same thing over and over again, eventually gets extremely boring. On the other hoof that\'s exactly why I am here. Something spectacular has happened recently. A _Necropolis_, an ancient city of the dead has finally revealed it\'s doors. In fact, we standing right next to the entrance. And... tell you what, take this key and go first, I mean you like adventures and stuff? And I\'ll come in right behind you, I just need to get ready.
So little time, so little time...
I must be ready.
I can hear the call of the dead.
There is something very special inside Necropolis.
